traits.name: Leviathan Will
entries: The hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and effects that control its actions.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The hunter can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes two attacks with its envenomed crossbow.

actions.name: Envenomed Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage.
